text: Thomas Stanford Lyle (November 2, 1953 â€“ November 19, 2019) was an American comic artist and educator. He was best known as for his work on Starman and Robin for DC Comics as well as Spider-Man for Marvel Comics. Lyle was born in Jacksonville, Florida. He taught classes at Savannah College of Art and Design.
